title: The best 85-inch TVs you can buy in 2026: Expert recommended
contentSnippet: Not all big-screen TVs are created equal, so I and other ZDNET experts have found the best 85-inch TVs from brands like Samsung, Sony, and more to help you create the ultimate home theater.
